text: Joshua David "Josh" Duhamel (born November 14, 1972) is an American actor and former fashion model. He is well known for his role in the movie Transformers. From 2009 to 2017, he was married to singer Fergie. ==Early life== Duhamel was born in Minot, North Dakota. His mother, Bonnie L. Kemper, is a massage therapist, and his father, Larry Duhamel, is an advertising salesman. He is of French-Canadian, Irish, English, German, and Norwegian ancestry. Duhamel was raised Catholic. == Personal life == Duhamel married singer Fergie on January 10, 2009. Their son, Axl Jack Duhamel, was born on August 29, 2013. In September 2017, the pair announced their divorce. == Notes == ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * 10 North Main, Duhamel's restaurant Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American models Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Actors from North Dakota Category:Musicians from North Dakota Category:People from Minot, North Dakota
title: Josh Duhamel
